projects.name: infinit
projects.title: The Infinit Storage Platform.
projects.description: Infinit is designed with scalability and resilience in mind for modern environments such as containers that require the storage component to be highly customizable.

projects.name: elle
projects.title: The coroutine-based asynchronous C++ development framework.
projects.description: Elle is a collection of libraries, written in modern C++ (C++14). It contains a rich set of highly reusable concepts, algorithms, API wrappers, ...

projects.name: drake
projects.title: Build system written in Python3 that transforms a list of source nodes into a list of target nodes.

projects.name: dopenssl
projects.title: A deterministic implementation of some of the OpenSSL functionalities.

projects.name: Key/Value Store
projects.title: DHT layer providing a key-value store similar to hash tables, with the difference that the information is distributed across the network.
